Hey, I'm Ryan.

I am curious about how technology is shaping our society and our behaviors. Being a product designer allows me to dive into this topic and make an impact with my skills. To better understand how the technology works, I taught myself coding to learn from the developers' perspective.

I have earned Best Use of Sketch on Eduhacks Hackathon 2017. My portfolio has been featured on Bestfolios. On the side, I am working with my friends to build out a community for ECU design students to learn from industry alumni. To keep my creativity going, I love doing photography and riding a fixed gear bike.

I'm currently looking for new opportunities in the SaaS industry. Please don't hesitate to reach out.

Books I have read recently

Rework by Jason Fried and David Heinemeier Hansson

Shape Up by Ryan Singer

Just Enough Research by Erika Hall

Lean UX by Jeff Gothelf and Josh Seiden

Amusing Ourselves to Death by Neil Postman
